TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MsmqIntegrationMessageProperty extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示消息的消息队列 (MSMQ) 集成属性。

span.span: Represents the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration properties for a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可公开所有的消息队列消息属性，您可在发送消息或读取通过集成通道接收的消息时，设置这些属性。The class exposes all of the Message Queuing message properties that you can set when you send a message or read a message that has been received using the integration channel. 您还可利用 类来设置消息队列消息属性，这同时也是我们的建议方法。The class also enables you to set Message Queuing message properties, and is the recommended way to set Message Queuing message properties. 如果要使用通道和消息基础结构来创建消息并通过集成通道发送所创建的消息，则您可以将 类用作该消息的属性，这样集成通道就可检索消息属性，将该消息格式化为消息队列消息，并通过网络发送它。When you use the channels and messages infrastructure to create a message and send it over an integration channel, you can use the class as a property of the message so that the integration channel can retrieve the message properties and format the message as a Message Queuing message and send it on the wire.

summary.span: 获取或设置接收消息队列 (MSMQ) 生成的确认消息的队列。

span.span: Gets or sets the queue that receives the acknowledgment messages that Message Queuing (MSMQ) generates.

value.span: 接收消息队列生成的确认消息的队列。

span.span: The queue that receives the acknowledgment messages that Message Queuing generates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发送到管理队列的确认消息可以指示原始消息是否到达了目标队列，以及是否被从该队列中移除。The acknowledgment messages sent to the administration queue can indicate whether the original message reached its destination queue and whether it was removed from the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列 (MSMQ) 会将消息正文内容视为一个对象或一个序列化的流。Message Queuing (MSMQ) recognizes the body contents as an object or as a serialized stream. 正文类型指示消息正文中的对象的类型。The body type indicates the type of the object within the body of the message.

summary.span: 获取或设置确认、报告和响应消息用以引用原始消息的消息标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the message identifier used by acknowledgment, report, and response messages to reference the original message.

value.span: 确认、报告和响应消息用以引用原始消息的消息标识符。

span.span: The message identifier used by acknowledgment, report, and response messages to reference the original message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列 (MSMQ) 生成确认或报告消息时，它会使用相关标识符来指定原始消息的消息标识符。When Message Queuing (MSMQ) generates an acknowledgment or report message, it uses the correlation identifier to specify the message identifier of the original message. 这样，相关标识符就可将报告或确认消息与原始消息关联起来。In this manner, the correlation identifier ties the report or acknowledgment message to the original message. 然后，发送应用程序就可利用相关标识符，对确认或报告与原始消息进行匹配比较，从而验证原始消息的标识。The sending application can then match the acknowledgment or report with the original message by using the correlation identifier to verify the original message's identity.

summary.span: 获取消息的标识符。

span.span: Gets the message's identifier.

value.span: 消息的标识符。

span.span: The message's identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发送消息时，消息队列 (MSMQ) 会生成消息标识符。Message Queuing (MSMQ) generates a message identifier when the message is sent. 该标识符由 20 个字节组成，其中包括两项：发送计算机的计算机 GUID 和消息在该计算机上的唯一标识符。The identifier is composed of 20 bytes and includes two items: the machine GUID of the sending computer and a unique identifier for the message on the computer. 这两项组合在一起，就产生了一个在网络上唯一的消息标识符。The combination of the two items produces a message identifier that is unique on the network. 消息队列会为所有消息生成消息标识符，其中包括确认消息和报告消息。Message Queuing generates message identifiers for all messages, including acknowledgment and report messages. 通常，确认消息是由消息队列发送的，这是对原始的已发送消息的到达或失败的响应。An acknowledgment message is generally sent by Message Queuing in response to the arrival or failure of an original sent message.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Label { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Label : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]
[set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置描述消息的应用程序定义的 Unicode 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets an application-defined Unicode string that describes the message.

value.span: 描述消息的应用程序定义的 Unicode 字符串。

span.span: An application-defined Unicode string that describes the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息标签有多种用途。You can use a message label for several purposes. 例如，可用于显示消息，或根据标签值有选择地处理消息。For example, you can use it for display purposes or to selectively process messages based on the label value. 消息标签不必是唯一的。It is not necessary to make the label unique across messages. 消息队列和消息标签表示一个应用程序定义的值，可利用该值将标识队列或消息用人可识别的词条标识出来。Message queue and message labels represent an application-defined value that can help identify the queue or message in human-readable terms. 应用程序负责解释标签的内容，对于消息队列而言，这些内容没有任何实质意义。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret the label contents, which have no intrinsic meaning to Message Queuing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MessageType As Nullable(Of MessageType)
public: property Nullable<System::Messaging::MessageType> MessageType { Nullable<System::Messaging::MessageType> get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取消息类型：、 或 。

span.span: Gets the message type: , , or .

value.span: 消息类型：、 或 。

span.span: The message type: , , or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列 (MSMQ) 通常会在发送消息时设置此属性。Message Queuing (MSMQ) typically sets this property when it sends the message. 消息队列消息可以是下列类型之一：A Message Queuing message can be one of the following types: - “正常”，从应用程序发送到队列的典型消息或返回给发送应用程序的响应消息。Normal, which is either a typical message sent from an application to a queue, or a response message returned to the sending application. - “确认”，消息队列在发送应用程序请求消息时生成的消息。Acknowledgment, which Message Queuing generates whenever the sending application requests one. 例如，消息队列可生成肯定消息或否定消息，以指示原始消息已到达或已被读取。For example, Message Queuing can generate positive or negative messages to indicate that the original message arrived or was read. 消息队列会将相应的确认消息返回到发送应用程序所指定的管理队列。Message Queuing returns the appropriate acknowledgment message to the administration queue specified by the sending application. - “报告”，源队列管理器上定义报告队列时生成的消息。Report, which is generated whenever a report queue is defined at the source Queue Manager. 如果启用了跟踪，则每当原始消息进入或离开消息队列服务器时，消息队列都会向消息队列报告队列发送报告消息。When tracing is enabled, Message Queuing sends a report message to the Message Queuing report queue each time the original message enters or leaves a Message Queuing server.

summary.span: 常数值“MsmqIntegrationMessageProperty”。

span.span: The constant value "MsmqIntegrationMessageProperty".

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Priority As Nullable(Of MessagePriority)
public: property Nullable<System::Messaging::MessagePriority> Priority { Nullable<System::Messaging::MessagePriority> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Messaging::MessagePriority> value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置消息优先级，该优先级用于确定消息在队列中的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the message priority, which determines where in the queue the message is placed.

value.span: 消息优先级。

span.span: The message priority.

value.span: 这些值由 定义。

span.span: The values are defined by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks “优先级”会影响消息队列 (MSMQ) 处理处于路由过程中的消息以及到达目标的消息的方式。Priority affects how Message Queuing (MSMQ) handles the message both while it is en route and once it reaches its destination. 在路由过程中，优先级高的消息具有优先权，将会插入到目标队列的队首。Higher-priority messages are given preference during routing and inserted toward the front of the destination queue. 而具有相同优先级的消息则会按照到达的先后时间插入到队列中。Messages with the same priority are placed in the queue according to their arrival time.

exception.span: 该值不能为 null，并且不可在 值的范围之内。

span.span: The value is not null and is not within the range of values.

summary.span: 获取或设置接收应用程序生成的响应消息的队列。

span.span: Gets or sets the queue that receives application-generated response messages.

value.span: 接收应用程序生成的响应消息的队列的 URI。

span.span: The URI for the queue that receives application-generated response messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识接收应用程序生成的响应消息的队列，接收应用程序会将这些响应消息返回给发送应用程序。Identifies the queue that receives application-generated response messages, which the receiving application returns to the sending application. 当应用程序发送其消息时，发送应用程序会指定响应队列。The sending application specifies response queues when the application sends its messages. 任何可用队列均可指定为响应队列。Any available queue can be specified as a response queue. 返回到响应队列的消息是应用程序特定的。Messages returned to the response queue are application-specific. 应用程序必须定义消息的内容以及收到消息时采取的操作。The application must define the contents of the messages as well as the action to take upon receipt of a message.

summary.span: 获取发送计算机上的源队列管理器发送消息的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the date and time on the sending computer that the message was sent by the source queue manager.

value.span: 发送计算机上的源队列管理器发送消息的日期和时间。

span.span: The date and time on the sending computer that the message was sent by the source queue manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发送时间将会被调整为创建消息的计算机上的本地时间。The sent time is adjusted to the local time of the computer on which the message was created. 该时区可与源队列和目标队列的时区不同。This time zone can be different from those of the source and destination queues.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property TimeToReachQueue As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: property Nullable<TimeSpan> TimeToReachQueue { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };
member this.TimeToReachQueue : Nullable<TimeSpan> with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置消息到达队列所用的最长时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of time for the message to reach the queue.

value.span: 消息到达队列所用的最长时间。

span.span: The maximum amount of time for the message to reach the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在消息到达其目标之前， 属性所指定的时间间隔就到期了，则 MSMQ 会遵照绑定上的 `DeadLetterQueue` 属性所指示的行为，丢弃该消息。If the interval specified by the property expires before the message reaches its destination, MSMQ discards the message depending on the behavior indicated by the `DeadLetterQueue` property on the binding.

exception.span: 该值不可为 null，也不可小于零。

span.span: The value is not null and is less than zero.
-or-

exception.span: 该值不可为无穷大，并且要大于 Int32.MaxValue 毫秒。

span.span: The value is not infinite and is greater than Int32.MaxValue milliseconds.
